1.0.name: wordpress/sharepost
1.0.description:
Get Noticed Worldwide

Create a customized sharing widget in many different languages and help your international visitors share your content and spread the word to their friends.

The SharePost widget integrates with many international social bookmarking services, so your visitors are offered sharing services with which they’re most familiar to help them share your content with their friends and others that speak the same language. This can help you gain international interest and more traffic from a broader audience.

Customize It!

There are many ways to customize the look of the SharePost widget. Change buttons, colors, sharing tools, and languages. It’s easy to integrate the SharePost widget into your website or blog.

By presenting visitors with an appealing sharing tool in their languages, you increase the likelihood of your content being shared with others.
